Text: Special gift offer for Palmtm handheld ownersNonPrivilegedpst At its a Gift Dear Jeffrey Now until October when you buy the PalmTM m handheld for just youll receive three stylish faceplates for free Thats over in savings This special package makes a gift that anyone would love Buy one for a friend or a loved one and theyll probably think you paid a lot more than you actually did So give someone the gift of organization with these helpful tools Date book To do list Calculator Address book Memo pad All this plus three interchangeable faceplates makes it easy to match anyones mood Its all available for the limitedtime price of which makes it the perfect gift Just dont forget to remove the price tag Click below to purchase Or call to order via phone udqEQUuPZZecCB Sincerely The Palm Team ps Remember all orders from the Palm Store are covered by our day money back guarantee If you wish not to receive these special offers from Palm please respond to this email with the word unsubscribe in the Subject line CopyrightC Palm Inc Palm OS Palm Computing HandFAX HandSTAMP HandWEB Graffiti HotSync iMessenger MultiMail PalmNet PalmConnect PalmGlove PalmModem PalmPoint PalmPrint and the Palm Platform Compatible Logo are registered trademarks of Palm Inc Palm the Palm logo AnyDay EventClub HandMAIL the HotSync Logo PalmGear PalmGlove PalmPix Palm Powered the Palm trade dress PalmSource Smartcode and Simply Palm are trademarks of Palm Inc All other brands and product names may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners
